ns:common.topic.description: Orc is a concurrent, nondeterministic computer programming language created by Jayadev Misra at the University of Texas at Austin.\nOrc provides uniform access to computational services, including distributed communication and data manipulation, through sites. Using four simple concurrency primitives, the programmer orchestrates the invocation of sites to achieve a goal, while managing timeouts, priorities, and failures.
rdfs:label: Orc

ns:common.document.text: Orc is a concurrent, nondeterministic computer programming language created by Jayadev Misra at the University of Texas at Austin.\nOrc provides uniform access to computational services, including distributed communication and data manipulation, through sites. Using four simple concurrency primitives, the programmer orchestrates the invocation of sites to achieve a goal, while managing timeouts, priorities, and failures.
